subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar has approved Penske Racing’s request to transfer owner points to Sam Hornish Jr. from Kurt Busch, a move that locks Hornish, a three-time IndyCar Series champion, into the first five Nascar races of next season. Hornish, a former Indianapolis 500 winner, is leaving the IndyCar Series for Nascar next season.
